Question: Emilie Preiswerk was the youngest child of Samuel Preiswerk who was also Paul Achilles ****'s professor of Hebrew.
Hints: Although **** was close to both parents he was rather disappointed in his father's academic approach to faith.
In October 1925, this person embarked on his most ambitious expedition, the "Bugishu Psychological Expedition" to East Africa.
This person saw Freud's theory of the unconscious as incomplete and unnecessarily negative.
